```{r}
wins <- 6
games <- 9
```

---


```{r}
dbinom(x = wins, size = games, prob = 0.5)
```

---


```{r}
pbinom(q = 5, size = games, prob = 0.5)
```

---

```{r}
1 - pbinom(q = 5, size = games, prob = 0.5)
```
oder

```{r}
pbinom(q = 5, size = games, prob = 0.5, lower.tail = FALSE)
```
